thread.title: Focus Media, CEO, to Pay $55.6 Million for Inaccurate Disclosures
thread.title_full: Focus Media, CEO, to Pay $55.6 Million for Inaccurate Disclosures - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Focus Media, CEO, to Pay $55.6 Million for Inaccurate Disclosures
text:
A Chinese advertising company and its chief executive have agreed to pay $55.6 million to resolve charges they withheld critical information from investors in connection to the 2010 sale of its Internet advertising business.
Under the terms of the settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Focus Media Holding Ltd. will pay $34.6 million to investors and Chief Executive Jason Jiang, the companyâ€™s founder, will pay a $9.69...
